original_title: Шерлок Холмс и доктор Ватсон: Сокровища Агры
overview: Holmes and Dr. Watson help a young lady who is receiving anonymous letters 10 years after her father passed away under shady circumstances. They find themselves in an enigma involving a treasure, murder and a love interest for Watson.
title: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson: The Treasures of Agra
